insights.populationGrowth: Growing 1.6% with agricultural productivity and border access supporting population.
insights.educationLevel: Moderate 81% literacy with agricultural and cross-border influences.
insights.employmentPattern: Agriculture 48%, small industry 18%, border trade 15%, services 12%, government 7%.
insights.housingPattern: Traditional houses 65%, modern houses 25%, border facilities 10%.

insights.temperature: Subtropical, warm winters (18°C), hot summers (32°C). Southern border plains.
insights.precipitation: Very high 3,200mm, among highest in Bhutan. Extreme monsoon flooding.
insights.seasonality: Warm winter, hot pre-monsoon, extreme monsoon, humid post-monsoon.
insights.extremeEvents: Catastrophic monsoon flooding, landslides, infrastructure destruction.

recentDisasters.impact: 90% of area flooded, complete infrastructure failure

preparedness.reliefCapacity: Medium - Border access but extreme risks
